org.workflowsim
Class ClusterStorage

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudbus.cloudsim.HarddriveStorage
      org.workflowsim.ClusterStorage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Storage
public class ClusterStorage
extends HarddriveStorage

ClusterStorage is an extention of HarddriveStorage and it is used as a local storage system of a vm

Since:
WorkflowSim Toolkit 1.0
